permissions.title: Notifications Permission
permissions.rationale: Thoughtmarks needs notification permissions to send you reminders, daily digests, and AI-powered insights to help you stay organized.

required.title: Permission Required
required.message: Please enable notifications in Settings to receive push notifications.

provisional.title: Quiet Notifications
provisional.message: We'll deliver notifications quietly. You can change this anytime in Settings.

denied.title: Notifications Disabled
denied.message: To receive reminders and updates, please enable notifications in your device Settings.

granted.title: Notifications Enabled
granted.message: You'll now receive reminders and updates from Thoughtmarks.

aiInsight.title: AI Insight
aiInsight.body: We've discovered insights from your thoughtmarks

emailRequired.title: Email Required
emailRequired.message: Please configure your email address in Account Settings to receive email notifications.

errors.permissionFailed: Failed to enable push notifications. Please try again.
errors.registrationFailed: Failed to register for notifications. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.scheduleFailed: Failed to schedule notification. Please try again.
